Our mission is to help you wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated every morning, so you can take on the day with energy and enthusiasm. Before you start browsing our collection of mattresses, we would like to take a moment to provide you with some important information about our products and services. This disclaimer is intended to ensure that you have a clear understanding of what you can expect from us, and to help you make an informed decision when purchasing a mattress from our site. First and foremost, it is important to note that all of our mattresses are designed to provide optimal comfort and support for a wide range of sleepers. However, every person is unique, and what works well for one person may not work as well for another. That is why we offer a 100-night trial period on all of our mattresses, so you can try it out in the comfort of your own home and make sure it is the right fit for you. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your mattress during the trial period, simply contact our customer service team and we will arrange for a free return and refund. Please note that the mattress must be in good condition and free from any stains or damage in order to be eligible for a return. In addition to our 100-night trial period, all of our mattresses come with a 10-year limited warranty. This warranty covers any defects in materials or workmanship that may arise during the warranty period, and we will repair or replace your mattress at no cost to you if such a defect occurs. However, please note that the warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, or damage caused by improper use or handling. When it comes to the materials used in our mattresses, we are committed to using only the highest quality, eco-friendly materials available. All of our mattresses are made with CertiPUR-US certified foams, which means they are free from harmful chemicals and substances such as formaldehyde, heavy metals, and phthalates. In addition, our mattresses are designed to be hypoallergenic and resistant to dust mites, mold, and bacteria, so you can sleep easy knowing that your mattress is not only comfortable, but also safe and healthy. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website, we cannot guarantee that all of the information is completely accurate or error-free. In addition, we cannot be held responsible for any typographical errors or inaccuracies on our site. When you make a purchase from RestfulNights, you can rest assured that your personal information is safe and secure. We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect your information during transmission, and we do not sell or share your information with any third parties. However, please note that we may use your information to contact you regarding your order or to provide you with updates and promotional offers. In addition to our financing options, we also offer a price match guarantee to ensure that you get the best possible price on your mattress. If you find a lower price on an identical mattress from a competing retailer, simply contact us and we will match the price. Please note that the price match guarantee applies only to identical mattresses, and does not include promotional offers or clearance items. At RestfulNights, we are committed to protecting the environment and reducing our carbon footprint. That's why we use eco-friendly materials in our mattresses, and why we participate in a mattress recycling program to ensure that old mattresses are disposed of in an environmentally responsible manner. When you purchase a mattress from RestfulNights, you can feel good knowing that you are not only getting a high-quality product, but also supporting a company that cares about the environment. We are also committed to giving back to our community. That's why we donate a portion of our profits to charities and organizations that support causes such as education, healthcare, and environmental conservation. When you purchase a mattress from RestfulNights, you are not only improving your own sleep, but also helping to make the world a better place. If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer, please contact us at restfulnights@gmail.com. We are always here to help and support you in any way we can. The information we collect may include: Name Address Email address Phone number Payment information We also collect information about your use of our website through cookies and other tracking technologies. This information may include: Browser type and version Operating system Referring site Page views and navigation paths Time spent on our site How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process your orders, communicate with you about your purchases, and provide you with customer support. We may also use your information to: Send you promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information that we think may be of interest to you Personalize your experience on our site Improve our products and services Comply with legal obligations We will only use your personal information for the purposes for which it was collected, unless we have your consent to use it for another purpose. Sharing Your Information We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. These service providers include payment processors, shipping providers, and email marketing providers. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your experience on our site and to collect information about your use of our site. Cookies are small files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow us to recognize your device and remember your preferences when you return to our site. We use both session cookies, which expire when you close your browser, and persistent cookies, which remain on your device until you delete them. We also use web beacons, which are small electronic images that allow us to track your use of our site. We use cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes: To remember your preferences and settings To analyze the performance of our site and identify areas for improvement o personalize your experience on our site To target advertising to you based on your interests and browsing history You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, but please note that if you choose to disable cookies, some features of our site may not function properly. Data Breach Response In the event of a data breach, we will take prompt action to investigate the breach, assess the scope and impact of the breach, and notify affected individuals and regulatory authorities as required by law. We will also take steps to prevent future breaches, including reviewing and updating our security measures as necessary. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with the products and services you have requested, to comply with our legal obligations, and to enforce our agreements. We may also retain aggregated or de-identified information for research or statistical purposes. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. Social Media Features Our site may include social media features, such as the Facebook "Like" button and widgets, such as the "Share This" button. These features may collect your IP address, which page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly. Social media features and widgets are either hosted by a third party or hosted directly on our site. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing the feature.
